This is Giulio Valentino Dalla Riva's small place in the web.

If you are curious about who I am, you can find some info about me here.

I will be posting here updates about my research.

Now and then I will be tempted to share my thoughts about science, politics, music, the universe and everything else. But I will mainly write about mathematics, evolution and ecology. That's already quite a lot, to have an opinion on!

This goofy website has been created using Jekyll with Type Theme on a Linux machine.
